note: This file tracks snack images that need to be sourced or replaced with real photographic images.
requirements: All images must be real photographs (no AI, illustrations, or cartoons)
Preferred sources: Unsplash, Pexels, Wikimedia Commons, or Google Images (labeled for reuse)
Each image must include photographer credit
If an image cannot be found, the snack may be replaced with a similar real dish from another country
status: All 40 snacks currently have image URLs from Unsplash. If any images fail to load, fallback images will be used automatically.
